about_the_game:
Nanali in another world is a captivating puzzle-platformer where players will navigate a world divided into two dimensions, each filled with its own dangers and secrets. By controlling the heroine, Nanali, you can switch between these realities, allowing you to discover unique paths and solutions to progress through the levels.

Each area of the game is filled with interactive elements, intricate puzzles, and clever traps that require quick reactions and well-thought-out strategies. By utilizing the dimensional mechanics, you'll avoid dangers, unlock new areas, and solve logical challenges.

The visual style of the game is presented in retro-pixel art, evoking the atmosphere of classic platformers. Combined with dynamic gameplay and the exciting mechanic of switching between worlds, Nanali in another world offers a unique gaming experience for puzzle and platformer enthusiasts.

Key Features of Nanali in another world:

  • Dimensional Switching Mechanics:The ability to switch between two parallel worlds is the game's core mechanic. It allows players to find new paths, solve puzzles, and bypass traps, making each level unique and strategically engaging.
  • Varied Levels and Increasing Difficulty:The game offers a wide range of challenges that become more difficult as you progress. Traps and puzzles require not only logical thinking but also smart use of dimensional switching to overcome them successfully.
  • Retro-Pixel Graphics:The game is styled in retro-pixel art, which gives it the charm of classic platformers and adds visual appeal.
  • Atmospheric Soundtrack:The music and sound effects enhance the immersion in the game world, creating a sense of adventure and mystery.

highlighted.name: Complete ten levels with three stars
Complete twenty levels with three stars

name: Nanali in another world

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\ Vista \ 7 \ 8 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1030
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: Nanali in another world is an engaging puzzle-platformer where players must explore two dimensions and solve complex challenges using the unique abilities of the main character.
supported_languages:
